summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RouteCast app features. All 15 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all requested features working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns general info only, not location-specific weight restrictions

critical_code_review_comments: Bridge clearance alerts data is MOCKED - returns empty array as no real bridge data source is integrated
Clear X buttons implemented correctly with data-testid attributes (clear-origin-btn, clear-destination-btn)
seed_data_creation: None needed - app uses external APIs (NOAA, Mapbox, Google Places)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are implemented and working: 1) Water Budget shows Fresh/Gray/Black tanks, 2) Casinos page shows search prompt when location unavailable, 3) Route page has Bridges tab for height hazards, 4) Clear X buttons implemented on origin/destination inputs, 5) How To Use page is comprehensive with support@routecast.com email, 6) How To Use button visible on home page. Bridge clearance alerts are MOCKED (empty array) as noted by main agent.

features_verified.notes: All three tanks display correctly with proper calculations
Shows 'Enter a city or address' prompt when location not available, autocomplete works
Shows Bridge Height Hazards section, prompts to enable Trucker Mode for alerts

features_verified.feature: Clear X buttons on address inputs
features_verified.notes: Implemented with close-circle icons and data-testid attributes

features_verified.feature: How To Use button on home page
features_verified.notes: Visible in quick access row alongside Boondockers and Truck Drivers

mocked_apis_noted.bridge_clearance_alerts: Returns empty array - no real bridge data source integrated
